subject: Football
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: A midday, midweek workout is under way, and the Miami Dolphins are practicing punting. The snap is waist high, the blocking is solid, and a booming kick sails all the way to the goal line.
snippet: A midday, midweek workout is under way, and the Miami Dolphins are practicing punting. The snap is waist high, the blocking is solid, and a booming kick sails all the way to the goal line.
